about_the_game:
Chosen Card Chronicles is a charming, card-collecting visual novel adventure!

Chris is a troubled young man recovering from a tragic incident that left him speechless. At his little sister Charlotte's strong insistence, he moves in with his cousins Mona and Melanie Mooney to make a fresh start.

Upon his arrival, the girls introduce him to Tower of the Chosen, a mysterious card game that quickly becomes his sole means of emotional and intellectual expression...

Key Features:

  • Fast-Paced Card Combat: Experience fast, unpredictable duels where combos and strategic decision-making are key to victory! Overcome increasingly difficult opponents as you progress through the story!

  • Engaging Visual Novel Storytelling: Meet and befriend over 25 captivating characters! Challenge them to battles, use their strategies to improve your own, and form lasting bonds through your shared love of cards!

  • Deck-Building Freedom: Discover and collect over 900 cards! Mix and match elements to create the ultimate deck! Experiment with endless possibilities: there are tons of synergies and combos to discover!

  • Special Events & Tournaments: Test your skills in a variety of special events and tournaments that reward strategic thinking and creativity!
